title: [Community Activity] League Champs FUSED! Make your requests here! FREE AND FUN!

embed.description: Post with 1 votes and 0 views. Shared by Sprojent. League Champs FUSED!

body:
Name any two champs you want to see fused and drawn. I'm combining them all! So far we've done

Teemo+Blitz 
Vi+Urgot
Sion+Ahri

If you like what I'm doing, gimmie a thumbs up! Upvote your favourite suggestions or make your own below! My twitch is 'TheKingofEloHell' if you want to watch me draw live.

Thanks for your support guys!

EDIT: Got a request on stream for DRAAAAAVEN and LULU. I present to you: DRUUUUUUUUUULU! https://imgur.com/gallery/PrxLtH0

Karthus + Ezreal is next

Ezarth: https://imgur.com/gallery/OuTDpkG

replies.body:
{{champion:2}} +{{champion:92}} 

Oven

Most broken champ ever.

And the hottest too.
Would love to see {{champion:102}} and {{champion:10}}

>

>
> Can you do Fizz and Nami

I might consider it if you smash that upvote button.
Do Morde and Garen.
Zed+Kass.

{{champion:202}} + {{champion:222}}

Would something that crazy even be able to function?

Rakarhi

Ahrkan

Raki

> 
> {{champion:103}} + {{champion:37}} 
> {{champion:429}} + {{champion:203}}

> {{champion:164}} + {{champion:22}} 
> {{champion:420}} + {{champion:161}} (You know why)
> 
> etc. etc.

Just remember my name! I’m really busy Tuesday-Thursday but time for drawing opens up over the weekends!
Nami + Evelynn, the devil of the deep

Have fun :)

that wasn't part of the deal.

I named 2 sets of 2 that i want to see fused and drawn. according to your post you're combining them all. I don't know if i like what you're doing. "upvote your favourite suggestions OR make your own below. I chose to make my own.

nowhere did you state that upvotes were required.

checkmate.

i'll be awaiting my fused images.

Vlad and Elise, please.

Perhaps Vel'Koz and Zoe?

> [{quoted}](name=Tharizdûn,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=wPPPPfUQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-09-02T22:39:58.733+0000)
>
> Vlad and Elise, please.
> 
> **Perhaps Vel'Koz and Zoe?**

... you sick person.
{{champion:44}} +{{champion:6}} = The Sexiest Champion ever.
Hmm... What about Nasus and Yorick? They're both very different, so a combination of their styles could be cool
Azir + Xerath would be interesting
